name: Benya Role-Play
description:
Benya Role Play is an online Role-Play game for PC. Do you want to experience life in Parrot County and play as a parrot? Lead an entire district? Join the bandits?

You have maximum freedom of action, do not miss this unique chance, join the game!

For doshik and project development: https://vk.me/moneysend/godotbenny
